q: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
h:
“The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.” —
Leo Tolstoy

q: Stay away from people who makes you feel like you are wasting their time.
h:
“Stay away from people who makes you feel like you are wasting their time.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
h:
“Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.” —
Hans Christian Andersen

q: If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time.
h:
“If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time. ” —
Zig Ziglar

q: It takes a very long time to become young.
h:
“It takes a very long time to become young.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
h:
“The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.” —
Zen Proverb

q: An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.
h:
“An inch of time is an inch of gold but you can't buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.
h:
“We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.” —
T.S. Eliot

q: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
h:
“Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.” —
Marcus Aurelius

q: Sometimes a change of perspective is all it takes to see the light.
h:
“Sometimes a change of perspective is all it takes to see the light.” —
Dan Brown

q: There can be no greater gift than that of giving one's time and energy to help others without expecting anything in return.
h:
“There can be no greater gift than that of giving one's time and energy to help others without expecting anything in return.” —
Nelson Mandela

q: Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
h:
“Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Saying nothing sometimes says the most.
h:
“Saying nothing sometimes says the most.” —
Emily Dickinson

q: Hardly anybody recognizes the most significant moments of their life at the time they happen.
h:
“Hardly anybody recognizes the most significant moments of their life at the time they happen.” —
W.P. Kinsella

q: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
h:
“A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.” —
Charles Darwin

q: Time goes from present to past.
h:
“Time goes from present to past.” —
Shunryu Suzuki

q: To some degree, you control your life by controlling your time.
h:
“To some degree, you control your life by controlling your time.” —
Conrad Hilton

q: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
h:
“Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.” —
T.S. Eliot

q: Sometimes you will never know the value of something, until it becomes a memory.
h:
“Sometimes you will never know the value of something, until it becomes a memory.” —
Dr. Seuss

q: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
h:
“Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted. ” —
Denis Waitley

q: It's the little things done consistently over time, straight from your heart, that have the greatest impact.
h:
“It's the little things done consistently over time, straight from your heart, that have the greatest impact.” —
Unknown

q: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
h:
“Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.” —
Zig Ziglar

q: If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through.
h:
“If you get up one more time than you fall, you will make it through.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
h:
“Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

q: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
h:
“Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.” —
Marilyn Monroe

q: Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.
h:
“Many people spend more time looking at their failures than focusing on their successes.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: It is our experiences that mold us into who we are...during times of adversity our true character will show.
h:
“It is our experiences that mold us into who we are...during times of adversity our true character will show.” —
Unknown

q: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
h:
“If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done. ” —
Bruce Lee

q: The saddest aspect of life is that there is no one on earth whose happiness is such that he won't sometimes wish he were dead rather than alive.
h:
“The saddest aspect of life is that there is no one on earth whose happiness is such that he won't sometimes wish he were dead rather than alive.” —
Herodotus

q: It is not that we have too little time to do all the things we need to do , it is that we feel the need to do too many things in the time we have.
h:
“It is not that we have too little time to do all the things we need to do , it is that we feel the need to do too many things in the time we have.” —
Gary Keller

q: Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
h:
“Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
h:
“Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.” —
Robin Sharma

q: Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.
h:
“Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.” —
Dogen

q: Lost Time is never found again.
h:
“Lost Time is never found again.” —
Benjamin Franklin

q: Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.
h:
“Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.” —
Jim Rohn

q: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
h:
“Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.” —
Lao Tzu

q: You can live a whole life time never being awake.
h:
“You can live a whole life time never being awake.” —
Dan Millman

q: If you want work well done, select a busy man; the other kind has no time.
h:
“If you want work well done, select a busy man; the other kind has no time.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Every time we liberate a woman, we liberate a man.
h:
“Every time we liberate a woman, we liberate a man. ” —
Margaret Mead

q: Trust is built and maintained by many small actions over time.
h:
“Trust is built and maintained by many small actions over time.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: Sometimes, the only way to evolve is to open ourselves fully.
h:
“Sometimes, the only way to evolve is to open ourselves fully.” —
Kamal Ravikant

q: Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.
h:
“Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
h:
“An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.” —
Laurence J. Peter

q: Your only obligation in any lifetime is to be true to yourself.
h:
“Your only obligation in any lifetime is to be true to yourself.” —
Richard Bach

q: It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.
h:
“It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: To create more positive results in your life, replace 'if only' with 'next time'.
h:
“To create more positive results in your life, replace 'if only' with 'next time'.” —
Celestine Chua

q: You may delay, but time will not.
h:
“You may delay, but time will not.” —
Benjamin Franklin

q: Mastery is not a function of genius or talent, it is a function of time and intense focus applied to a particular field of knowledge.
h:
“Mastery is not a function of genius or talent, it is a function of time and intense focus applied to a particular field of knowledge.” —
Robert Greene

q: Time doesn't heal emotional pain, you need to learn how to let go.
h:
“Time doesn't heal emotional pain, you need to learn how to let go.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.
h:
“Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.” —
Thomas Jefferson
